segments.text: Oh hello , Sally . This is Dave Thomson here . Could I speak to Jim please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid he's not in at the moment Dave . He went out about an hour ago and he's not back yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any idea when he might be back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he shouldn't be long . He said he was just going to get some paint . But I wouldn't be surprised if he's stopped off at the pub on the way back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . well , tell him I've called , will you , and I'll try again later .
segments.speaker: S2
